Reviews.Title: love the camera and lenses, accessories are garbage
Reviews.Author: Ronald Held
Reviews.Content: The d3200 is an awesome camera, the nikor lenses are a great deal. The accessories are crap. The tripod fell apart upon removing it from the box, it wont even support the camera without tilting or collapsing the legs.

Reviews.Title: Just buy the camera and accessories ala cart
Reviews.Author: J. Mcginnis
Reviews.Content: I am new to DSLR so I bought this "kit" which had many things I just didn't need or want. The camera bag is not very impressive; it's okay but I bought a real Nikon one instead. The tripod is not that great; small and unstable. I ended up buying a different more stable tripod. When these items are purchased as a "kit" you cannot exchange or return just some of the items; you are stuck with the whole thing. I didn't really consider this at the time as I was very excited about the new Camera. The extra lens is a good lens, however, you might want to price them separately, as with the other items.

Reviews.Title: Hard to take a bad photo
Reviews.Author: D. Cox "little hands"
Reviews.Content: The D3200 is a great DSLR for beginners or advanced. The kit was great. The bag was smaller than I thought. It holds the accessories sent with the kit but if you have more than two lens and one flash, you will need to go buy a much bigger bag like I did. The tripod is a little weak but I didn't need one - I already have 3 more professional grade. I actually looked for kits that did not have a tripod and replaced it for some other needed accessory but it seems like everyone wants to include a tripod with a kit. I'll probably give this one away to someone who doesn't have one because the ones I have are so much better.Overall, for the price I give this a 5 starts because the things I needed were there and it arrived ahead of schedule. I absolutely love this camera. Buy an external flash, wireless flash, or flash kit. The built in flash will work in a pinch but I don't recommend using it on a regular basis.

Reviews.Title: Camera + kit nikon
Reviews.Author: kakario
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as ad. All products are good. Nikon d3200 has an incredible resolution and pictures w auto focus even if you no nothing !!!!! It arrive exactly on the date expected! I'm very happy

Reviews.Title: Great camera, cheap accessories
Reviews.Author: Christopher R Bridges
Reviews.Content: This was not necessarily the best value for what I got. Should have shopped around a little more. The camera is great. I'm sure if I got into photography very seriously I could think of features it doesn't have that I'd want, but for an amateur like me it is outstanding. It's the only reason this got 3 stars instead of 2. The accessories that come with this camera kit are bottom tier quality. The tripod is sufficient, but rickety, the memory card is off-brand (we'll see how soon it fails, I only hope it doesn't have precious pictures on it when it does), and the bag is a bit smaller than expected. The package might be worth it if the second lens was the 55-300 instead of 55-200, but the features of the 55-200 don't exceed the stock 18-55 lens enough for me to consider this purchase a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kit
Reviews.Author: Matias Castro Cancino
Reviews.Content: Awesome kit, great pieces, great camera and zoom lens... it has everything you need to start in the photography world

Additional EN-EL14 Reachargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR and 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED IF AF-S DX "VR" Zoom-Nikkor Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
